page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: The recently completed Fulstow village hall was probably the most well used and important amenity in the area. Over 50% of the population who were interviewed went there weekly or even more frequently.It was mentioned by many people as being one of the reasons that they enjoyed living here. Our mobile library and fish and chip vans were also very popular,but many were disappointed that the post office was the only shop in the area. Most people preferred to do their shopping weekly, or even monthly,at the super markets in town. Everyone thought that the prices were expensive at the local shop. Finally, 90% of people who answered our questionnaire thought that the Domesday project was worthwhile , though some had never heard of it !
